name: Athletics 2012
description:
Athletics - Season 2 is now live! Start playing now and score medals for your country!

Be a part of the biggest international sport competition on iPhone, iPod and iPad for FREE!
Enjoy the rich HD graphics, vivid colors, and crystal clear sounds!

_____________________________

It's simple! Beat the Goal to make a record!
It's addictive! Be a part of the international game competition.
It's fun! Win medals for your country!
_____________________________

Features:
- 2 Sports with 9 Disciplines.
- Rich HD graphics and crystal clear sounds
- Game Center support
- Mind blowing animation and physics

We at Zariba would like to express our gratitude to all of our fans and supporters!

Thank you!

Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/ZaribaLtd
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/ZaribaLtd
Follow us on YouTube: www.youtube.com/ZaribaLtd
Visit our website: www.zariba.com

PLEASE NOTE! Athletics 2012 is completely free to play, but it contains items which can be purchased for real money. If you do not wish to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
